title: Typophile TypeID (@typeid) on Twitter
content:
Happy New Year everyone!

Got the first rev of a pet project working yesterday. It's not perfect yet, but now you can encourage people out there to submit Type ID requests via Twitter.

More here: [http://typophile.com/node/65805](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012085348/http:/typophile.com/node/65805 "http://typophile.com/node/65805")

[http://twitter.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012085348/http:/twitter.com/typeid "http://twitter.com/typeid")
author: Jared Benson
